[[Image:Bandallon Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Bandallon on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Bandallon''' is a castle in [[the Reach]], the region controlled by [[House Tyrell]] of [[Highgarden]]. The castle is located west of [[Brightwater Keep]] on the southwestern coast of the continent of [[Westeros]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/highgarden/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Highgarden entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Bandallon is the seat of House Blackbar.
